amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to negotiate or enter into a trade agreement that establishes a limit on greenhouse gas emissions. The limitation described in the section shall not apply in the case of the administration of a tax or tariff.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A082) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 179 (Roll no. 267).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A082) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 179 (Roll no. 267).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A082) offered by Mr. Meadows.
